Get required version of specified package dependency

Source: R/utils.R
get_dep_version.Rd

Get required version of specified package dependency

Usage

get_dep_version(dep, pkg = utils::packageName())

Arguments

dep

Dependency of the specified package to check

pkg

Package to check the dependency from
